description: Detects a possible process memory dump that uses the white-listed Citrix TrolleyExpress.exe filename as a way to dump the lsass process memory
name: Process Access via TrolleyExpress Exclusion
query: (process.command_line:(*\\TrolleyExpress\ 7* OR *\\TrolleyExpress\ 8* OR *\\TrolleyExpress\ 9* OR *\\TrolleyExpress.exe\ 7* OR *\\TrolleyExpress.exe\ 8* OR *\\TrolleyExpress.exe\ 9* OR *\\TrolleyExpress.exe\ \-ma\ *) OR (process.executable:*\\TrolleyExpress.exe AND (NOT ((winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:*CtxInstall*) OR (NOT _exists_:winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName)))))
author: Florian Roth
